data.author: Vladimir Nabokov
data.quote: The breaking of a wave cannot explain the whole sea.

data.author: Sylvia Plath
data.quote: Go out and do something. It isn’t your room that’s a prison, it’s yourself.

data.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
data.quote: A man sees in the world what he carries in his heart.

data.author: Banksy
data.quote: Nobody knows what you feel inside unless you tell them.

data.author: Søren Kierkegaard
data.quote: Do it or don’t do it — you will regret both.

data.author: Juan Gabriel Vásquez
data.quote: The saddest thing that can happen to a person is to find out their memories are lies.

data.author: Shinji Moon
data.quote: You are beautiful because you let yourself feel, and that is a brave thing indeed.

data.author: Lao Tzu
data.quote: New beginnings are often disguised as painful endings.

data.author: Elvis Presley
data.quote: People think you’re crazy if you talk about things they don’t understand.

data.author: Joyce Meyer
data.quote: You are not free until you have no need to impress anybody.

data.author: Haruki Murakami
data.quote: Whatever it is you’re seeking won’t come in the form you’re expecting.

data.author: Oscar Wilde
data.quote: Don’t be afraid. There are exquisite things in store for you. This is merely the beginning.

data.author: Mike McHargue
data.quote: People grow when they are loved well. If you want to help others heal, love them without an agenda.

data.author: Oscar Wilde
data.quote: The truth is rarely pure and never simple.

data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
data.quote: People do not seem to realise that their opinion of the world is also a confession of their character.

data.author: Ernest Hemingway
data.quote: We are all broken, that’s how the light gets in.

data.author: Katherine Henson
data.quote: Having a soft heart in a cruel world is courage, not weakness.

data.author: John Steinbeck
data.quote: It’s so much darker when a light goes out than it would have been if it had never shone.

data.author: Paulo Coelho
data.quote: Don’t allow your wounds to turn you into a person you are not.

data.author: Hellen Keller
data.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
